plot: Too many things remind Madeleine she's old. But this Sunday, 22, she has the opportunity to be a citizen like any other.
plot_es: Too many things remind Madeleine she's old. But this Sunday, 22, she has the opportunity to be a citizen like any other.
plot_en: Too many things remind Madeleine she's old. But this Sunday, 22, she has the opportunity to be a citizen like any other.
